# Randy Westlund

 

[City Council](https://www.postfalls.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=10)  
Title: City Council Seat 5  
[Email Randy Westlund](mailto:rwestlund@postfalls.gov)

Term of Office: 2024 through 2027

## Overview

"It is a profound honor to serve the Post Falls community as a City Council member. This role is not just a position, but a commitment to uphold the values that make our city a beacon of family, resilience, and local spirit. My dedication to fostering a thriving, resilient community is rooted in a belief in good Christian stewardship and the power of local action. It's a privilege to contribute to the well-being and future of our families and small businesses. Ad Majorem Dei Gloriam."

Randy Westlund was elected to City Council Seat 5 in 2024. He is currently serving his first term on the Council.

He and his wife, Jacqueline, have four children. Randy and his family moved to Post Falls in 2018 after living in Boston for six years. He grew up in North Carolina, but his wife has roots here going back generations.

Randy has a B.S. in Computer Engineering from the University of North Carolina at Charlotte. He is a self-employed software engineer and entrepreneur with well over a decade of experience building custom software for small businesses. He previously worked for NASA on satellite communication gear in Antarctica.

### Community Service

- Precinct Committeeman, Kootenai County Republican Central Committee
- Founding board member, Kootenai Strong
